name: Wind Sword
nutshell: The world is riddled with beasts and demons, however little do people know that a magical barrier is currently sealing away high-level demons. There are those who wish to break the barrier and bring about the end of the world, and those who wish to protect it and its inhabitants. A great battle with heroes, villains, demons and magic is about to begin and will determine the fate of the world.

name: The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild - Attention-Seeker (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Artistâ€™s Pixiv
 Artistâ€™s Twitter

name: Minna Daisuki Marutarou
nutshell: A touching story following the life of a boy with a round penis.

name: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji
nutshell: Once upon a time, there was a swordsman who wielded the sword, lived by the sword, and died by the sword. After days and months of battle, the swordsman chose death by his own free will, but was reborn as Fay Hanse Diestburg, the third prince of the kingdom of Diestburg. Wanting to distance himself from his past life where he lived as if possessed by the sword, Fay decided to just lead a life of a wastrel, earning the nickname Trash Prince. However one day, because of a pact with the neighboring kingdom's Afillis royal house, Fay is sent to war, leading reinforcement troops. On the battlefield, Fay witnesses a scene of despair, as the "Hero," an existence possessing power rivaling tens of thousands, ravaged the battlefield. Fay considered returning to the kingdom, but a certain knight's death manages to shake his heart, thus he decided to wield the sword once again. The legend of the strongest lazy prince begins!

name: Hakoiri no Musume
nutshell: Tamako, who has lead a sheltered life all her life, wants to attend a university in Tokyo to follow her boyfriend there but is opposed by her grandfather. So she plans a fake engagement with Noriyuki in exchange for her grandfatherâ€™s financial support to his familyâ€™s shop while both he and she gets to study in Tokyo.

name: Spooky Spirit Akemi-chan
nutshell: A story about an irregular yet beautiful camaraderie between two solitary girls.

name: Yuusha Party wo Oidasareta Shiryou Majutsushi wa Lich ni Natte Maou-gun de Daisukina Kenkyuu Life wo Okuru
nutshell: It was believed that the most powerful necromancer in the brave party died in battle and was left for dead. But he wasn't dead. He is resurrected as a "Lich", a being "physically and magically the strongest", and decides to leave the human race and live with the demons. He decided to leave the human race and live on the side of the demons because the demons were richer and he could learn necromancy more freely! With Alice (a beautiful woman), one of the six demon generals, as his partner, the Lich plunges into his research. Will the Lich be able to live the quiet life he has always dreamed of without the interference of adventurers?

name: A Troublemaking Senpai Comes to Play
Build King (One-shot)
nutshell: Special oneshot from the creator of Toriko.

name: Black or White
nutshell: Himemiya Shin has always wanted to become an actor ever since he was in high school. Now, he is an up and coming actor who only gets roles for the bad guys. Tatebayashi Kazushige has always wanted to go to college, but instead he became an actor. Now, he is an up and coming ikemen who only gets the likable roles. These two opposites may look like they have nothing in common on the outside, however, what secrets lay on the inside? Follow these two as their mysterious show business secret love unfolds.

name: Bliss Zero and...
nutshell:
Note: In the crossover fighting game, SvC Chaos (SNK vs Capcom), Demitri (from Capcom's Darkstalkers) can use his Midnight Bliss attack to forcibly genderswap his male opponents.
Zero, in his Rockman/Megaman Zero series incarnation, is also a playable character in that game, which is where this pseudo-canonical Blissed Zero form originates from.

name: Touhou - Yuka Kazami's Sunflower Field (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Anthology that focused on Yuuka.

Untitled (Chado)
Flowers and Humans and Youkai andâ€¦ (Bococho)
Untitled (Cercis)

Of the Umbrella and the Two (Imogawa Haruko)
Flower Master (Mock)
Dreaming Maiden (Ugatsu Matsuki)

name: A Revolutionary in the Afternoon
nutshell:
Another short story collection from JirÃ´ Matsumoto.
Contains 5 stories:

A Revolutionist in the Afternoon
A Revolutionist in the Afternoon 2 (not a sequel to the first one)
Desert Witch: A wounded man is being chased, but then he stumbles on cursed grounds
Takeyama's Life: A vampire, who is not really into the whole gothic vampire thing.
The Footmen Flee: Two men are in the battlefield, and all they want to do now is go home (without being killed by the opposing side)

name: Iblard Monogatari - The Scenery of Laputas
nutshell: A manga written by Naohisa Inoue featuring all the main characters of Iblard. The book consists of multiple short stories such as â€œThe Legend of Megezoâ€,â€œHow to Find the Way Back From the Marketâ€,â€œThe Awakening of a Laputa,â€ which introduce us to these main characters and their powers. This book is also the key to learning the unique words, expressions and objects of Iblard. Much like looking through a window, Iblard Monogatari explores the fantastic and beautiful world of Iblard by panning through art created by Naohisa Inoue. Iblard shows itself to be nothing short of amazing and will wash serenity over your mind.

name: A Single Match
nutshell: In this collection of hauntingly elliptical short stories, Oji Suzuki explores memory, relationships and loss with a loose narrative style, filling each tale with a sense of unfulfilled longing. He plumbs the dissolute depths of human psychology, literally bathing his characters in expansive shadows that paradoxically reveal as much as they obscure. A young man catches a cold after being soaked in the rain and is tended to by his grandmother. He drifts, dreaming of a train trip with an older brother he doesn't have. A traveling salesman comes across a boy lying in the middle of the road and stops to have a cigarette and tell a story that drifts through memories of faces and places, before settling back on the traveling salesman and the boy pretending to not look at the stars. A young woman walks along the river with her bicycle and a friend who is nothing more than a disembodied head, discussing past times together, memories they have of each other.

name: Aishiteruze Babyâ˜…â˜…
nutshell:
Kippei Katakura is a 17-year-old playboy who spends his time chasing girls, careless of their feelings. But when his 5-year-old cousin Yuzuyu comes to live with his family after her mother's sudden disappearance, Kippei is put in charge of taking care of her. As Kippei gets to know Yuzuyu and starts to understand how she feels, he also begins to realize that all girls were like Yuzuyu onceâ€¦
See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.

name: Personal Space
nutshell:
After her third divorce, my mom kept changing through lovers and even keeps asking me for money. I couldnâ€™t understand my mom and didnâ€™t wish to live that way either.
I believed that an ideal relationship and family that mothers dream of, doesnâ€™t exist.
But whyâ€¦ Why did you have to appear in my life again and make me unnecessarily hopeful?

name: Suijin no Hanayome
nutshell:
The story of a girl who slips back in time to a different era. While playing in her family's garden, Asahi gets sucked in by the small pond and when she wakes up she finds herself in a place that seems like Japan from ancient times. A powerful clan takes her in, but the reason for their kindness is that they intend to sacrifice her to the water god, the dragon, to be his brideâ€¦ Now that she is at the mercy of a god who appears to know no compassion, what will Asahi's fate be?
Links:

Author's Twitter

name: Wish~Time of the Witch
nutshell: We have dreams from time to time. Dreams of being able to use magicâ€¦ Magic! If witches were to listen to everyone's wishes, who would listen to the witch's wishes?

name: Dengeki Nekomimi Samurai
nutshell: Cat girl samurai in ecchi situations.

name: Sweet Revenge
nutshell:
Sara is filled with anger whenever a picture of Don-ya-ye's new model appears, because he made a mistake and a model she knew was injured badly.
Don-ya-ye, not only does he control the camera, but his models as well, by making them fall in love with him.
Sara will try to get revenge, a sweet revenge by getting as close to him as possible.

name: Kantai Collection -KanColle - Nagabon (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Nagato Book.

name: Yuri Yuri Nikki
nutshell:
I plan to write about my girlfriend who I'm living together with from time to time.âœ¨ I started with a basic profile! (Names are fake, of course.) It's mostly from my point of view, but I hope to interrogate my girlfriend to write from her viewpoint as well â˜ºï¸. These will be released under the #ã‚†ã‚Šã‚†ã‚Šã«ã£ã tag [see title translations]. ğŸ’• Enjoy!!!

name: The Stunning Co-habitation with a Devil
nutshell: One day, a devil comes for me? A stunning tale of co-habitation with a cute (?) devil.

name: Kyoumei Suru Echo
nutshell: Kyoumei Suru Echo is a collection of shorts from Tsubomi magazine, that are intertwined by mutual acquaintance but otherwise don't intersect. Included are the stories Kyoumei Suru Echo ('Lonesome Echo'), Runner's High, Unbalance, and Asymmetry.

name: The Goal Is to Become a Gold Spoon so I Need to Be Completely Invulnerable
nutshell:
â€œI was born with a gold spoon in my mouth but Iâ€™m being murdered miserably? Iâ€™ll survive thoroughly and live a long life!â€
Iâ€™ve been reincarnated as the younger sister of my favoriteâ€™s novel character who is destined to be poisoned by her step-mother at the age of seventeen. My brother is on an adventure with the heroine so I have to survive by myself. Should we start with survival plans? First, be sure to behave myself around my step-mother and step-sister. Secondly, become close with children of influential families. Third, isâ€¦ umhâ€¦ getting married?
To escape the fate of a miserable death, I, Adriana, begin to approach the Prince of the Empire, the suspicious Master, and the suspicious Demon!
